channel.title: Using the Choice Method
channel.description:
Hi, On my server i want to make it so when someone clicks an object it gives a choice of whether to do somnething or not too do something..
Here is what i have so far. [code]case 2769: choice("Yes, I want to go enter The lair", "No, I might die"); break; [/code]
on the server it opens the text box interface but when i click it does nothing.. how can i make it so if i click yes it teleports using toX and toY method.

item.title: Using the Choice Method
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Read this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,426474.0.html
Scoll down to the part that states “Npcdialogues”.

Read full topic

item.title: Using the Choice Method

item.description:

Hi, On my server i want to make it so when someone clicks an object it gives a choice of whether to do somnething or not too do something…

Here is what i have so far.

case 2769: choice("Yes, I want to go enter The lair", "No, I might die"); break;

on the server it opens the text box interface but when i click it does nothing… how can i make it so if i click yes it teleports using
